Post Title: Local Registration in a Module System
Post Description: If you’re still here, then it’s likely you’re using a module system, such as with Babel and Webpack. In these cases, we recommend creating a components directory, with each component in its own file.

Global registration often isn’t ideal. For example, if you’re using a build system like Webpack, globally registering all components means that even if you stop using a component, it could still be included in your final build.
